bug.short_desc: Add option to split boot part into the part list and the part's source code

long_desc.thetext:
The boot part in a build version of an application contains the script list and the code of the boot part. We need to add an option to generate this into two files.
The first file should contain only the part list and a minimal loader for the second file. The second file contains the JavaScript code of the boot part.

Implemented in qooxdoo trunk, with r19246. Use the config key packages/loader-with-boot=false to split the loader logic from the boot class code. Packages are then numbered from 0.
With loader-with-boot=true (the default), the old behaviour is executed, where the boot packages is joined with the loader logic (resulting in less loader logic ;). The old numbering in this variant is also retained, ie. the remaining packages start with 1. This might be considered inconsequential and worth another bug.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
